As a mission-driven bank, Amalgamated strives to create products that 
have a triple bottom line effect: environmental, social and financial.
We offer products, programs and services that increase and preserve 
affordable housing, advance clean energy initiatives, grow small and 
minority-owned businesses, support greater access to healthcare and 
help immigrants and working-class people to save, reduce debt and 
participate fully in the American dream.
